After I had witnessed the confederacy for raising the wages of the workers in the Office, the Lord brought me into the meetings of the auditing committee that settle with the ministers for their labor. Angels of God were there, making a record of everything done. Brother Henry's voice was the controlling power, cutting down wherever he pleased, deciding the wages of the workers according to his 
                                                                           1384
ideas and feelings. How little did any one think that the universe of heaven were noting every transaction. Brother Henry was not a poor man, he accepted large wages for himself, and gave his strong influence of securing large wages for others in the Office. But these other workers, whose circumstances neither he nor other members of the auditing committee took pains to ascertain, were paid according to the impulse of this one man. This work will be met in that great day when every work shall be brought into judgment, with every secret thing, whether it be good or whether it be evil." Jesus says, Behold, I come quickly; and my reward is with me, to give every man according as his work shall be. "The Lord of heaven is not correctly represented by many of those who claim to be representatives of him. They are transgressors of his commandments. But he declares, "Them that honor me will I honor."
